data.name: Weight dropdown height isn't recalculated every time the dropdown opens, but only on page load.
data.description:
So if you are unweighted and you choose a weight then open the dropdown, you need to scroll to see "Unweighted" (as brian reports below). 

Conversely, if you begin weighted and you unweight then open the dropdown again, there's an extra 'blank' space at the bottom.

*Sender*: brian.law@yougov.com

*Browser*: Chrome 58 (Mac OS X Yosemite)
*Referer*: https://app.crunch.
*Screen size*: 2560 x 1440
*Browser size*: 2543 x 1324
Open #576 in Usersnap Dashboard: https://usersnap.com/a/#/crunch-io/p/alpha-and-beta/576
----
Powered by http://usersnap.com/

data.description: No matter what you put in either box, it says “you must enter 4 unique characters”
